Package ooga.controller

Interface BackEndExternalAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
ModelController
public interface BackEndExternalAPI
Classes that implement this interface are meant to be passed around the front end in order to call the appropriate methods on the back end

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void actOnCoordinates​(int x, int y)
    Acts on this set of coordinates.
    void changePiece​(java.lang.String pieceName)
    Changes the active piece to the new piece based on this name
    Engine getEngine()
    Primarily for testing, this method gets the engine that the game is running on
    void setBoardController​(FrontEndExternalAPI viewController)
    Links this half of the controller to the other half that is passed around the back end
    void setBoardState​(java.io.File boardFile)  
    void setBoardState​(java.lang.String boardFileName)
    Sets the initial state of the board
    void setGameType​(java.lang.String gameName)
    Sets the type of game that will be played
    void setPlayers​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String opponent)
    Sets a player that is playing the game
    void undoTurn()
    Undoes a turn

  • Method Details

    • setBoardController

      void setBoardController​(FrontEndExternalAPI viewController)
      Links this half of the controller to the other half that is passed around the back end
      Parameters:
      viewController - The other half of the controller

    • setGameType

      void setGameType​(java.lang.String gameName)
      Sets the type of game that will be played
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game

    • setPlayers

      void setPlayers​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String opponent)
      Sets a player that is playing the game
      Parameters:
      user - The first player, who has the bottom of the board
      opponent - The second player, who has the top of the board

    • setBoardState

      void setBoardState​(java.lang.String boardFileName)
      Sets the initial state of the board
      Parameters:
      boardFileName - The file name that contains the board

    • setBoardState

      void setBoardState​(java.io.File boardFile)

    • actOnCoordinates

      void actOnCoordinates​(int x, int y)
      Acts on this set of coordinates. May include showing all possible moves, placing a piece, or doing nothing
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate
      y - The y coordinate

    • undoTurn

      void undoTurn()
      Undoes a turn

    • changePiece

      void changePiece​(java.lang.String pieceName)
      Changes the active piece to the new piece based on this name
      Parameters:
      pieceName - The name of the new piece

    • getEngine

      Engine getEngine()
      Primarily for testing, this method gets the engine that the game is running on
      Returns:
      The engine
